It blocks every popup you can imagine plus YouTube commercials. Its made so gud it also blocks simple downloads or pictures and random flash videos across the Internets that are not even ads and ENTIRE FUCKING PAGES! It even pwns ED's own sitenotice!
The biggest enemy of Adblock Plus is the Jews, they just want to make money and dont give a shit about the billon popups on the page.They try to counter Adblock with simple banners like "You are using addblock, you dont make moar money for me, plx close AdBlock or bla blahahah BLA BLA". DO NOT show mercy! These filthy kikes got away with too much already. A new tactic they made up in their war against Adblock is that they'll tell you that Adblock will cause site function problems if you don't disable it. Never fall for it.
